_meta.description: Size classification data for all vehicles
_meta.methodology: EPA VClass where definitive; interior volume for Standard SUVs
_meta.notes: EPA 'Small Sport Utility Vehicle 4WD' = mid. 'Standard Sport Utility Vehicle 4WD' requires additional criteria (interior volume, wheelbase) to distinguish mid vs full.
